Name: on
Desc: Adds an event listener to each node.
Long Desc: The on method attaches event listeners to all elements in the current selection. It supports multiple space-separated event types and allows for configuration of event handling behavior through options. This method provides a unified interface for binding various DOM events like click, keydown, submit, etc. The handler function receives the event object as its argument, and the method returns the original Q object for chainable operations.
